page.title: 02AMENITIES AND RECREATION
page.content: There are many amenities in the area for local residents these include, RINGWOOD ROAD AREA SHOPS:car showrooms small supermarkets,newsagents,post offices. OTHER AMENITIES:Mountbatten Arms, churches,dentists,playgroups,Alderney Hospital. ROSSMORE ROAD:chinese restaurant,post office,hairdresser,florist,butchers, supermarket,betting shop,Branksome Cemetry,Rossmore Hotel,Rossmore Library. RECREATION:NORTHBOURNE GOLF COURSE, BORNEMOUTH WATER COMPANY SPORTS GROUND,TRINIDAD BOYS CLUB,PLAYING FIELDS AND RECREATION GROUNDS in ROSSMORE ROAD,NEWTOWN LABOUR CLUB. The above amenities and recreation facilities provide the local residents with adequate services.
